nodes.text: Hawkbat's Perch was a Lambda-class shuttle assigned to the Hawkbat, a supply ship in service to Admiral Apwar Trigit and Warlord Zsinj.

Along with Hawkbat's Vigil, Hawkbat's Perch shuttled crew to and from their leave in the city of Revos on Storinal. Wraith Squadron's Plague Group used the two shuttles as the delivery mechanism for their stolen sample of Bunkurd Sewer Disorder to infect and quarantine the crew of the Hawkbat. They also serviced the shuttle as part of their deception.
